all_questions.question: What happens to a model's translation quality when it has access to training data within the same domain as the test set?
all_questions.context: If you can get hold of training data within the domain, then suddenly your translation quality is so much better.

all_questions.question: What is the ideal situation for a model's training and testing data?
How does having training data in the same domain as the test set impact the model's performance?
What is the implication of not having access to training data within the domain of the test set?
How does the model's translation quality compare when it has or doesn't have access to training data in the same domain as the test set?
